 10  
 11  # Lipschitz continuous functions
 12  
 13  A map `f : α → β` between two metric spaces is called *Lipschitz continuous* with constant `K ≥ 0`
 14  if for all `x, y` we have `dist (f x) (f y) ≤ K * dist x y`.
 15  
 16  In this file we provide various ways to prove that various combinations of Lipschitz continuous
 17  functions are Lipschitz continuous. We also prove that Lipschitz continuous functions are
 18  uniformly continuous.
 19  
 20  ## Implementation notes
 21  
 22  The parameter `K` has type `nnreal`; this way we avoid conjuction in the definition.
 23  Some constructors (`of_dist_le` and those ending with `'`) take `K : ℝ` as an argument,
 24  and return `lipschitz_with (nnreal.of_real K) f`.
 25  -/
 26  
 27  universes u v w x
 28  
 29  open filter
 30  open_locale topological_space nnreal
 31  
 32  variables {α : Type u} {β : Type v} {γ : Type w} {ι : Type x}
id             ┴
typ            ┴

 34  /-- A function `f` is Lipschitz continuous with constant `K ≥ 0` if for all `x, y`
 35  we have `dist (f x) (f y) ≤ K * dist x y` -/
 36  def lipschitz_with [metric_space α] [metric_space β] (K : ℝ≥0) (f : α → β) :=
id                       └──────────┘ ┴   └──────────┘ ┴       └─┘       ┴   ┴
src                      └──────────┘     └──────────┘         └─┘
typ                      └──────────┘ ┴   └──────────┘ ┴       └─┘       ┴   ┴
doc                      └──────────┘     └──────────┘         └─┘
 37  ∀x y, dist (f x) (f y) ≤ K * dist x y
id    ┴ ┴  └──┘  ┴ ┴   ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴ ┴ └──┘ ┴ ┴
src        └──┘             ┴   ┴ └──┘

114  /-- A Lipschitz function is uniformly continuous -/
115  protected lemma to_uniform_continuous : uniform_continuous f :=
id                                           └────────────────┘ ┴
src                                          └────────────────┘
typ                                          └────────────────┘ ┴
116  begin
st   └─────
117    have : (0:ℝ) < max K 1 := lt_of_lt_of_le zero_lt_one (le_max_right K 1),
id               ┴  ┴ └─┘ ┴      └────────────┘ └─────────┘  └──────────┘ ┴
src    └─────┘ └┘┴└┘┴┴└─┘┴ └────┘└────────────┘┴└─────────┘┴ └──────────┘┴ └─┘
typ    └─────┘ └┘┴└┘┴┴└─┘┴┴└────┘└────────────┘┴└─────────┘┴ └──────────┘┴┴└─┘
doc    └─────┘ └┘ └┘ ┴   ┴ └────┘              ┴           ┴             ┴ └─┘
txt    └─────┘ └┘ └┘ ┴   ┴ └────┘              ┴           ┴             ┴ └─┘
par    └─────┘ └┘ └┘ ┴   ┴ └────┘              ┴           ┴             ┴ └─┘
pid    └───┘└┘ └┘ └┘ ┴   ┴ ┴└───┘              ┴           ┴             ┴ └─┘
st   ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘└─
118    refine metric.uniform_continuous_iff.2 (λε εpos, _),
id            └───────────────────────────┘
src    └─────┘└───────────────────────────┘└─┘  └────────┘
typ    └─────┘└───────────────────────────┘└─┘  └────────┘
doc    └─────┘                             └─┘  └────────┘
txt    └─────┘                             └─┘  └────────┘
par    └─────┘                             └─┘  └────────┘
pid          ┴                             └─┘  └────────┘
st   ────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘└─
119    exact ⟨ε/max K 1, div_pos εpos this, assume y x Dyx, calc
